summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4687 for the improvement of the alley between Blocks 9 and 10, Front Street Cable Addition, being the alley from McGraw Street to Smith Street, between 1st Avenue North and Queen Anne Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54332, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
